content: **College Signings 6: Wrestling or baseball? This Petrides senior made a decision and landed at this D2 school** Updated:Jun. 11, 2025, 1:06 p.m. |Published:Jun. 11, 2025, 1:06 p.m. Petrides senior Lorenzo Lamattina is joined by mom Maria and dad Lawrence as he signs a National Letter of Intent to attend Georgian Court.(Courtesy of Courtesy of Joe Pena) Charlie De Biase Jr. | debiase@siadvance.com STATEN ISLAND, N.Y. — There’s nothing like having choices and Petrides senior Lorenzo Lamattina had plenty when it came to deciding where he’d go to college. Those choices, however, didn’t come from just one sport.
